Hellplague:
 
Hellplague watched the sensor probe a while longer, before walking over to the wall monitor.  the monitor showed nothing at the moment, because the computer was compiling the data on Malice's arm.  A few moments later, the screen came on again and this time with information.
At first on might mistake the image as a mistake, for the image appeared to be from an organic creature.  Muscle tissues, circulatory systems, it appeared to be a glitch or the wrong information.  But upon closer inspection, Hellplague found curcuit pathways, fiber optic wiring, and armies of nano robots.  The image zoomed out to examine the bounty hunter's skin, and the secret of his ability to absorb energy.
 
Or so Hellplague thought.
 
Other than his skin being a mass of synthetic substances organized to be organic, nothing amazing, no revelation, just his skin.
 
"Who did this?  Able to disguise their work so well?  Oh well.  Time to examine his power system.  Time to wake him up-"
Hellplague stopped as she realized something.  Thn she devilishly grinned and began to chuckle.  She walked back over to the table and began tapping commands into the controls.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
BlackNightmare:

The femme din't say anything else, and watched.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Hellplague:
>  
> The Sweep commander backhanded the other femme with a vicious 
snarl.
> "It would be well under way if the damned bot was online!  And 
since you aren't forth coming with details, I'll have to fully 
examine him before I can try to re activate him."
> Hellplague returns to the console on the table.  The arm over the 
table drops down and extends a probe into the gel and begins making 
passes over Malice's upper arm.  The screen on the wall begins to 
register, and Hellplague walks over to it.
> "Amazing... such technology... such craftmanship... I have never 
seen anything like this before.  He is unlike anything else in the 
universe.  That's why he was so powerful!  His healing, ability to 
absorb energy, he is one of a kind."
> She turns and walks back to the table, placing a finger on her 
chin thoughtfully.  She then turns to Blacknightmare.
> "As soon as I finish scanning him I will proceed with brainwashing 
him."
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare::
> 
> "Hiow long will you take to brainwashed him????"snarled 
> BlackNightmare"Unicron's pacience has limits"
>
